edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus
[Groovy] Class Tabulator

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus.Tabulator

class Tabulator

A class working with texts in a CTS, and formatting them in tabular form.

Property Summary
CitationModel cm

The CitationModel (an object type from the cite library) for the given document.
java.lang.Object columnSeparator

String value to use as column separator in tabular text output.

Current output file.

Keep regular expressions that destroy the beautiful formatting of my editor in a separate file.

debug

java.lang.Integer debug

groovyNSClosure

java.lang.Object groovyNSClosure
A map including closures implementing the javax.xml.xpath.Namespace interface. The namespace mappings themselves are stored in the map nsMap, and includes by default a mapping of the TEI namespace to the prefix abbreviation 'tei' : other mappings can be added with the addNSMapping method().

Method Detail

addNSMapping

void addNSMapping(java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String ns)
Adds a single namespace mapping (prefix -> URI) to the internal implementation of the javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext interface.
Parameters:
prefix - Abbreviation for the namespace URI.
ns - The full namespace URI.

getColumnSeparator

java.lang.String getColumnSeparator()
Gets current value to use as separator in columns of tabular text output.
Returns:
Current value for column separator.

getNSMaps

java.util.LinkedHashMap getNSMaps()
Returns the java LinkedHashMap representation of the all namespace mappings, as required for the javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext interface.

nodeIdsForXpath

java.lang.Object nodeIdsForXpath(java.lang.String xpString, org.w3c.dom.Element queryRoot)
Creates an unordered list of nodeId values for all nodes resulting from applying an xpath expression to a source node.
Parameters:
xpString - The Xpath expression to apply.
queryRoot - The Element to which to apply the Xpath expression.,
Returns:
An unordered list of integeres (nodeId values).

setColumnSeparator

void setColumnSeparator(java.lang.String s)
Sets String value to use as separator in columns of tabular text output.
Parameters:
s - The String to use as a column-separator value.

setNSMap

void setNSMap(java.util.LinkedHashMap m)
Assigns a mapping of abbreviations to namespace URIs to the internal implementation of the javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext interface.
Parameters:
m - The map to use in the NamespaceContext implemenation; map keys are the namespace abbreviations; map values are the full namespace URIs.

tabulate

void tabulate(CtsUrn urn, TextInventory inv, java.io.File srcFile, java.lang.String outputDir)
Retrieves the text identified by urn, and writes a representation of the text in tabular format to one or more files with base file name fileBase, using character encoding chEncoding.
Parameters:
urn - The URN of the text to retrieve.
inv
fileBase - The base name to use for output files.
chEncoding - The character encoding to use.

tabulate

void tabulate(CtsUrn urn, TextInventory inv, java.io.File srcFile, java.io.File outputDir)
Writes a tabulated representation of a canonically citable XML file.
Parameters:
urn - CTS URN of the document to tabulate.
inv - TextInventory with information about how to cite the document in question.
srcFile - Source file to tabulate.
outputDir - Writable directory where tabular output will go.
